Minneapolis.RSM Plaza: RSM Plaza is a 320-foot (98 m) tall skyscraper in Minneapolis, Minnesota. Formerly known as McGladrey Plaza, it was completed in 1969 and has 20 floors. In October 2015, the building was renamed RSM Plaza after its largest tenant, RSM US LLP. It is the 30th-tallest building in the city and is located on Nicollet Mall.
